name: A Game of Life
description:
Keep it alive!  You need to keep the forest alive.

  • Trees get water from lakes, growing when they have water and dying when they don't
  • If a group of trees get big enough you'll score points
  • Some large trees will turn into mountains and you'll get $10 each time they do
  • Trees near mountains will produce clouds
  • Clouds will spread and rain down water, creating lakes if they rain down enough
